long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily manage tab groups through keyboard hotkeys.

Supported Features
---
· Create new tab in current tab group.
· Remove current tab from its tab group.
· Create a new tab group from the current tab.



More features will be added in the future!

This is an open-source project. You can find the source code here:
https://github.com/defCoding/chrome-tab-group-hotkeys
